title: (7630-174) - 8 N263
description: Private Farm very close (1km) to the center of Odemira. Here you can buy some fresh eggs, fruit’s or vegetables (depending of the season). You can stay one night or long term also… We’re waiting for you !

title: (7630-174) Odemira - N263
description: Convenient and quiet on a Friday evening and if there is no match at the stadium. Possible for a large motorhome

title: (7630-174) Odemira - N263
description: Quiet place, surrounded by trees and very close to the town. the service station to unload water and load the motorhome is 2 min Intermaché. It's kind of dirty but you're in front of a restaurant. nobody bothers. free.

title: (7630-174) Santa Maria - Rua do Cemitério
description: Parking on the edge of Odemira. On foot you can easily reach the center. Now and then you hear a few dogs barking, otherwise it is nice and quiet. No services. Update March 17th 2022: now 3 places reserved for campervans (max 24hr)

title: (7630-174) Odemira - Unnamed Road
description: Large unpaved parking area next to the Intermarche. Almost flat, view of the surrounding area and flock of sheep in front of the door. However, it is loud. Loud music, dog barking and cat screaming and early in the morning, the Intermarche supplying trucks, allowed us only a little sleep.

title: (7630-174) Odemira - 2A Rua Souza Prado
description: Clean, public toilets with hot showers.

title: (7630-174) Odemira - 2b Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
description: Euro Relais Station at Intermarche, washing machine and dryer available.

title: (7630-174) Odemira - R. César Mirandas
description: Public toilets, no showers, very clean. It is located next to the Mira river, where you can walk along its banks with ducks.

title: (7630-174) Odemira - 27 N120
description: Water source, Some picknick tables, not a lot of parking space though.

title: (7630) Odemira - 46 N120
description: Very close to town. Without services. He says you can't stay overnight. Forbidden to stay at night

title: (7630-174) Odemira - 12 N263
description: Public parking to visit the city knowing that they do not want the Camping Cars spend the night on their territory.

title: (7630-174) Odemira - 41 Rua das Barreiras Vermelhas
description: Nice viewpoint where to stop and rest with beautiful views of the town.

title: (7630-174) - 38 Praça do Sul
description: Ample parking in Boavista dos Pinheiros outside the Alentejo natural park, near Odemira. Perfect place to spend a quiet night and avoid fines.

title: (7630-174) Odemira - 44 Rua do Sudoeste
description: Aldi supermarket car park with three spaces reserved for motorhomes. Sat difficult reception. Near the RN but quiet night. Day parking only.

title: (7630-208) Odemira - N393
description: Lidl in Odemira with special day parking space for motorhomes. Self-service washing machines on site.

title: (7630-174) - M552
description: Peaceful location with fantastic views. Only for self sufficient vehicles. A warm meal is possible.

title: (7630-174) Estibeira -
description: Roofed structure in the middle of the forest, near a water channel. There is plenty of shade to park and will fit about 20 cars. It is high so that vans and motorhomes fit under it. Perfect to escape the heat or the rain.

name: Zmar EcoResort
title: (7630) Zmar EcoResort
description: Zmar Eco Resort. Includes access to the heated indoor wave pool. Self-service restaurant. Very good facilities.

name: Bp petromira
title: (7630) Bp petromira
description: Only one gas station with the possibility of water to bunkers. No disposal !!!

title: (7630-174) - Unnamed Road
description: Place right next to a dirt road.  Stayed here after being sent away from a place in the nature park by the GNR.  The dirt road is very narrow, therefore only for vehicles with a width of max.  1.80m suitable.  We stayed for one night and today we're going to a place on the coast again.  Nearby is a small village with farms from which an elderly gentleman would walk here in the morning.  So please leave the place clean!

title: (7630-174) S.Teotónio - 2 Rua Dr.Justino Santos
description: There is water at the gas station.

title: (7630-174) S.Teotónio - 13 Rua 25 de Abril
description: Intermarché car park, for one night, fairly quiet at night but wake up early in the morning by the replenishment of the supermarkets, but ideal, nearby restaurant excellent o Barco, seafood

title: (7630-174) - Unnamed Road
description: Self-service launderette at Intermarche supermarket, in the car park in front of the shop entrance. Only one of each machine so we had to wait for half an hour to use. Only takes change. There is also a coffee shop and toilets in the shop as well.

name: Aguas Vivas
title: (7630-174) Aguas Vivas
description: Nice parking space, well maintained. Level gravel surface, clean sanitary building (2x toilet, 1x shower, 1x outdoor shower), supply and disposal. The operator is German, familiar and speaks Portuguese and English. The price includes a camper including two adults. Children up to 12 years are free, extra charge per person. Shower, bathroom included in the price. Electricity on site, internet too.

title: (7630-174) Odemira - M502-2
description: Great corner under the eucalyptus trees with picnic tables.

title: (7630-174) São Luís - Unnamed road
description: It’s a good spot when you are in the area. Right next to the river. It feels good to camp. Not good wifi. Sometimes some small boats Anker. Nature is nice. In the village is a café and shop

name: Flor do Brejo
title: (7630-578) Flor do Brejo
description: Rugged coast, beautiful beaches (15 minutes) and a characteristic hinterland with cork oaks, olive trees and cows on the field. On our Flor do Brejo estate you will experience peace, Portuguese country life and marvel at the beautiful skies and the grand starry sky. Stay with us at Flor do Brejo and discover the Alentejo with the Costa Vicentina. If you email us or send us a message via WhatsApp, you know for sure whether there is room.

title: (7630-174) São Teotónio - N120
description: Natural spring. Drinking water tap used by locals to refill water bottles. You can park by the road and walk about 30 meters to the little building in which the tap is located. Really clean drinking water, without chloride!

title: (7665) Luzianes - Vale Cernes
description:
Please call first ! or WhatsApp.

We are a family with 2 children aged 8 and 6 and emigrated to Portugal in May 2022.

We renovate our ruin with clay. and currently live in our trailer.

Away from the house there is a wonderful place in nature to stand and linger.
Enjoy the silence !

Are you interested in clay building, life in Portugal? Do you want to emigrate yourself, possibly with children, and have questions about emigration, buying a house, bureaucracy, etc.?
If there is time, we would be happy to share our experiences with you.

Simply ask for an overnight stay to exchange experiences.
 
In the village of Luzianes there is a small shop for basics (drinks, bread, biscuits etc.) There is a public shower that you can use.

The Santa Clara reservoir is super nice for swimming and hiking, it is about 15 minutes away by car.
in Santa Clara there is a gas station, two supermarkets, a café and a post office.

Everyone passing through with a self-sufficient car is welcome, also for longer periods, by arrangement. Animals welcome :) , but the site is not fenced.
At the moment there is no water and no electricity on the pitch.

We have a washing machine that can be used for a fee of 10 euros.

If you have any questions, just let us know ❤️

name: Zambufeira do mar
title: (7630) Zambufeira do mar
description: Urbanized area without homes, next to camping. No services, very quiet.

name: Camping Villa Park Zambujeira
title: (7630-174) Camping Villa Park Zambujeira
description: Camping "Camping Villa Park" with several places for motorhomes

title: (7630) Praia do Tonel - Unnamed Road
description:
Beautiful spot on the cliff.
Not recomended for motorhomes over 1,8m wide  because of long bumpy road with lots brush that was cleared 2018, see picture of map for way to go. 
Dec 2021: green road between the 2 beaches quite overgrown and uncomfortable to drive Even for small van. Road has holes and stones. Possibly worth the amazing views. Ideal beach without wave (access delicate position with â rope)
Forbidden to stay overnight

title: (7630-174) - CM1158
description: Small parking spot with a direct access to a hiking path on the cliff. Forbidden to stay overnight

title: (7630-174) Estibeira - 11B Rua da Padaria
description:
Large dirt parking lot next to a bus / restaurant
no services
village view
we spent a quiet night at several motorhomes
other possibility of parking on sidewalks of a road with little traffic visible behind the car park

title: (7630-174) Zambujeira do Mar - Unnamed Road
description: Parking along an entire urbanization without building and without circulation

title: (7630-174) Zambujeira do Mar - Unnamed Road
description: Developed housing estate but which seems abandoned, there are two streets and we settled on the one below, for more discretion. Nice view of the bay and the village of Zambujeira do Mar where it is impossible to park, full of prohibition signs. We were 3 vans, stay discreet otherwise this place will most certainly be banned.

title: (7630) Zambujeira do Mar - 5 Rua Joao Pedro da Costa
title_short: (7630) Zambujeira do Mar - 5 Rua Joao Pedro da Costa
description: Next to the semaphore radar. Do not miss the auction at the port around 11am. And the arrival of the boats before and the restaurants of the port, mountain biking. Great up to Cabo Sardo, once you have crossed opposite either by road and track or by stairs. No overnight stay.

title: (7630-174) - Unnamed Road
description: Spot at the edge of the cliff and sea view. Overnight forbidden

title: (7630-174) Zambujeira do Mar - 16 Rua de Santo António
title_short: (7630-174) Zambujeira do Mar - 16 Rua de Santo António
description:
Small parking for 2/3 campers, road with no background adjacent to the playground, very neglected, very close to the center and the beaches.
Tap with drinking water with nice jet, we stayed two nights, quiet.

title: (7630-174) Valas - Unnamed Road
description: Place away from the roads. You have to walk about 2 km by road. Praia da Lavagueira and Praia do Tonel. The access is reserved for the vans because, just before arriving, it is necessary to reach by an improvised road to avoid some small sticks. Overnight forbidden

title: (7630-174) Zambujeira do Mar -
description: Beautiful expansive quiet!!! Super place

title: (7630-468) Odemira - Cerro do Moínho, São Luís
title_short: (7630-468) Odemira - Cerro do Moínho, São Luís
description: Parking lot at a former mill with beautiful plants within a mixed eucalyptus forest; with many tables and benches distributed in the forest, grills and rubbish bins, two swings, a slide and a fitness parkour. There is also a water tap behind the upper grill. Access is via a short track through the forest if you follow the signs to the fitness trail above the village ("Circuito de Manutencão"). Overnight stays are also possible here. If you walk down the hill towards the village, you will come to clean, public toilets with sinks below the abandoned sports field. And a little further down on the main road there is the possibility to dispose of waste separately. São Luís is within walking distance and is a cute little town with supermarkets, health food store, bakery, market hall, playground and launderette in the center of town.

title: (7630-174) - Unnamed Road
description: Incredible place overlooking the cliffs access not super obvious but ok for van, 1 flat place. Prohibition to spend the night.

title: (7630-174) São Luís - 1 N120
description: Water filling area with the possibility of screwing an adapter to connect a hose

title: (7630-174) São Luís - 1 N120
description: Public toilets with drinking water. The bathrooms have frequent cleaning maintenance and are provided with toilet paper. Nearby you can park and spend the night quietly.

title: (7630-174) Zambujeira do Mar - 5 Rua Joao Pedro da Costa
title_short: (7630-174) Zambujeira do Mar - 5 Rua Joao Pedro da Costa
description: Public toilet next to the beach.

title: (7665) Padrona - N266
description: Small picnic bay, space for several WoMos, no sign

title: (7630-174) São Luís - 24 Rua Liga dos Amigos
title_short: (7630-174) São Luís - 24 Rua Liga dos Amigos
description: Small laundromat on site. Machine for changing banknotes. Directly opposite is a larger supermarket.

title: (7630-174) São Luís - 4 Rua Liga dos Amigos
title_short: (7630-174) São Luís - 4 Rua Liga dos Amigos
description: Small parking close to the city center. Quiet and dark.

title: (7630-174) Zambujeira do Mar - Unnamed Road
description: Public bathrooms with the possibility of showers. Hours 10 - 19.

title: (7665-880) Santa Clara -a -Velha - 3 Pç. Doutor Oliveira Salazar
title_short: (7665-880) Santa Clara -a -Velha - 3 Pç. Doutor Oliveira Salazar
description: Toilet very clean. The shower costs 50 centimes. Nice warm and a lot of pressure. At the corner of the street you will find an ATM. With motorhomes it's better to park in front of the square, it's tight here.

title: (7630-174) Santa Bárbara -
description: Here you have the opportunity to overlook the Alentejo. On some days with a sea of fog. Feel the full nature and enjoy the tranquility. There are many beautiful hidden places here in the mountains, spread over 60 hectares of land, where you can stand undisturbed with your bus. However, there are only unpaved roads that lead to the pitches, but they are still passable with a normal camper. There are water springs hidden in the mountains where you can fill up your water. Parking space and arrival only possible with contact. I look forward to your visit and wish you a safe journey!

title: (7665-880) - 5 Avenida Engenheiro Amaro da Costa
description: Quiet space on the river bank, with a kind of dock to jump into the water. On the way from the village, it is possible to pass without problems with a large volume van, it is designed to pass even with some water on top. The town has many services, care, and very friendly people. There is space to park several vehicles, and at the moment there is no prohibition sign.

title: (7630) Odemira - 3 Rua Do Comercio
description: Free public showers and toilets, very clean. The bathrooms are unixes. It has an electricity outlet. Next to garbage containers. Next to the car park there is a picnic table.

title: (7630-174) Odemira - Unnamed Road
description:
Private place with a very nice family. The pitches are simple and freely selectable. There is a shared bath house with a shower and composting toilet. A sink is also available. For the children there is a trampoline on the property and a few meters away there is a nice little playground with a small skate park. The small downtown of São Luís is 5 minutes away by bike. A bicycle can also be rented. In São Luís there are supermarkets, bakers, a weekly market, laundromat, pharmacy and a doctor.
The sea is about 15 minutes by car.

title: (7630-174) - Unnamed Road
description: Just for small vans!! The road is super sandy - take care. Great view and calm place. There are passing a few jogger, but from the evening till the morning is super silent. Overnight forbidden

title: (7630-174) - Unnamed Road
description: Public park in a quiet area. Ideal to spend the night near the beach without taking fines

title: (7630) S.Teotónio - Unnamed Road
description: Awesome cliff side spot, super quiet (we saw one other van - in Oct). No services but trash drop on the way out past the Church. Overnight prohibited

title: (7630-174) Odemira - CM1124
description: Very nice stop at the foot of the lighthouse. Possibility to go for walks along the cliffs. As pretty as Cabo De Sao Vicent but with a lot less people.

title: () Cavaleiro - 2 Rua Nova do Nascente
description: Cabo Sardao. The most beautiful site in Portugal. Parking wild edge of cliffs. Overnight prohibited.

title: (7630-174) - 10 Praça dos Fuzileiros
description:
Public toilets with parking nearby
WiFi acess
Good to go by bike or foot to the beach were you can take a shower...

title: (7630-174) - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking on the cliffs. You can descend the stairs to a beautiful beach. Not recommended for larger campers, suitable for vans only. Some local fishermen are around during the day but that's it.  Dirtroad to get there, but certainly doable. No service. Hiking path passes by. Forbidden to stay at night

title: (7630-174) São Teotónio -
description: Great little sweet country with a German-Portuguese family. Water is available but NOT potable. The owners are very friendly and willing to help with any questions. In the small town not far away you can buy the essentials. The beaches and bays are an absolute dream. The owners will be happy to advise you. English, German and Portuguese. Eggs can be bought at the farm. We felt very comfortable and will definitely come back. There is NO hot shower, NO toilet disposal! Please use the email address to contact us.

name: Monte Carvalhal da Rocha
title: (7630) Monte Carvalhal da Rocha
description: Quiet campsite with beautiful swimming pool, bar and restaurant. Shaded area under the pines and partial shade under the eucaliptus. Beach at 400m. Magnificent hike to Odeseixe.

title: (7630-174) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking for about 6 vans. The end of the road narrows through the vegetation, we with a T5 pass fair! A cove nearby with a lot of charm. Hiking trail that runs along the cliffs. the great neighbors. Overnight prohobited.

title: (7630-174) S.Teotónio - Unnamed Road
description: Small and quiet spot for small vans. Sea views. Access to beach. We stayed alone. A little sandy and narrow short track.

title: (7630-174) Odemira -
description: Parking for some cars (5-6) to go to Playa de Amália. The route is not the best, but it is doable.

title: (7630-174) Beja - M532
description: Public washing machine with dryer. Enclosed public toilets with integrated showers (cold water). Right next door an ATM (Multibanco).

name: Casas novas da Palmeira
title: (7630 590) Casas novas da Palmeira
description: **Reservation required** Our farm is located in the Portuguese "Outback", on a plateau with a beautiful view. If you love nature and animals, value good vegetables from the gardens, you've come to the right place. Perfect for unwinding and relaxing. At night you only hear the calls of foxes, owls and nightingales. The closest beach is 25 minutes away. To the next supermarket about 20 minutes. With a clear sky we have a beautiful view of the sea, the Monchique mountains and the stars. **Minimum stay 2 nights**

title: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes -
description: Access to the site by sandy road. Stressful but it passes in motorhome. Rather 4x4. Along a hiking trail, a few meters from the ocean. Complete calm.

title: (7630-174) Odemira - N120
description: Picnic area with 3 tables under the pines and eucalyptus.

name: Parque De Campismo São Miguel
title: (7630-592) Parque De Campismo São Miguel
description: Located in the Costa Vicentina Natural Park, the campsite offers a beautiful pine forest, very quiet, ideal to spend a good time near one of the best beaches, Odeceixe, and is a strategic place if you are hiking or cycling in the region. Friendly staff and great facilities including a very nice restaurant and a great swimming pool! Pets are only allowed in the low season (01/10 - 31/05).

title: (7630-174) Odemira - 176 Avenida do Mar
description: Acenha is a tiny group of modest fisherman’s houses on the cliff , there is a restaurant just next to the car park. The water source is at the end of a road where the fishermen keep their material, in theory you cannot enter unless you are a fisherman but if you just quickly fill the water and return to the parking no one should bother you. Great hikes on the cliffs and fresh fish from the fisherman’s !

title: (8670) Odeceixe - Unnamed Road
description: Nice spot next to a hill, surrounded by nature. Access by a somewhat complicated path but we did it in a van, no problem. No passage of the GNR (at the limit of the natural park). Thank you for leaving this place as clean as it is when you arrive ... :)

title: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes - Unnamed Road
title_short: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes - Unnamed Road
description: Space for 1 van. In this area they seem stricter on campers. It's follow a dirt road to the end. Nice quieter spot!

title: (7630-174) - Unnamed Road
description: Several roads and spaces where to hide surrounded by nature, is a bit dirty but to be placed well is not perceived so much. No noise, quiet, no police. Excellent for caravan, motorhome or any vehicle, there is little sand. Overnight prohibited.

name: Monte Cruz
title: (7665) Monte Cruz
description:
We offer a pitch with water & electricity and the magnificent view of the rolling hills of the Alentejo and the lake of Monte Cruz.

A natural paradise is being created on 4.5 hectares of land, which is filled with a lot
dedication to saving our precious commodity water and reforestation.

If you are interested in learning more about the project, life in Portugal and the cycles of nature, then you are welcome to combine your stay with a Monte Tour. The access to the property includes a dirt road of about 800 m. In addition, 2 dogs and 10 chickens live on the Monte.

Further services:

Monte Tour 3-4 h with snacks and drinks

Vegetable basket/jam
eggs
Massage 30mins/60mins/90mins
            
Please call before arrival or contact us via Whatsapp by phone or email

If you have any questions, please write a short message

title: (8670) Odeceixe - Unnamed Road
description: Small space for a van on the edge of the dirt road overlooking the valley and town. Kind of a steep driveway, but no problems in a regular van. No 4WD required. Very beautiful and peaceful. We stayed for 3 days and only 2 cars passed. No problems with the GNR as it's outside the national park area! Which is better than staying on the coast. Obviously no facilities. If you stay, don't leave trash! Don't listen to the French.

title: (7630-174) Vila Nova de Milfontes - Unnamed Road
title_short: (7630-174) Vila Nova de Milfontes - Unnamed Road
description: Peaceful place at the end of the road with 2 possible places: - large place for 2 or 3 van but no view. - place on the side of the path for 1 van with a view. Possibility of going down to the beach. No overnight stay.

title: (7630-174) Vila Nova de Milfontes - N393
description: Large, paved and straight course right on the main road. Therefore, possibly noise from passing vehicles.

name: Camping Corgo do Pardieiro
title: (7630) Camping Corgo do Pardieiro
description:
Treasure of nature
Amoreiras gare
7630-514
(Gravel Road)

Under the enormous stars and hidden among the hills of South west Portugal you can find  our ‘ Treasure of Nature ‘. A 8.5-hectare nature park which invites you to be with yourself in nature. A place where you can make endless walks, visit the beautiful beaches, get quiet by the wide views, read a good book in one of the hammocks or … just do absolutely nothing!

title: (7630) São Martinho das Amoreiras -
description:
Attention emplacement ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Quel dommage de ne l'avoir trouvé "que" pour le dej' et la sieste !
Vue à 360, moulin aux alentours et tranquillité absolue. Ici, dans cette partie du pays un peu aride, la nature est splendide.

⚠️ la piste d'accès est bien carrossable mais réservé à petit van (pas besoin de 4x4 mais camping  car impossible). Il fait faire preuve d'une attention particulière sur 20 m (petites ornières et cailloux moins petits ?), mais ça passe bien.

title: () Odeceixe - 36 Variante 19 de Abril
description: Below Odeceixe on the edge of a small river ... Parking is only permitted between 7:00 a.m. and 9:00 p.m.

title: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes -
description: Parking by the beach. A small restaurant next door. Prohibited at motorhome parking but we were in a van and it went very well. You can continue further, passing the ruins on the right. There are shaded and cozier places to spend a night or even more! There is no bcq spot around and this one is great :)

title: (8670) Odeceixe - Variante 19 de Abril
description: Only parking in the street next to the playground and wc we agree with 3 AC next to the river there is a ground parking where there were two AC but it was further away and next to some containers. we liked this one more.

title: (8670-320) Odeceixe - 31B Largo do Povo
description: Small parking lot in a dead end. We parked for the visit of the village but it was possible to stay the night, no ban. The squares are a little sloping but the place is very quiet and close to the village. No services.

title: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 5 Largo do Cais
title_short: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 5 Largo do Cais
description: Water tap by the pontoon

title: (7645-311) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 5 Rua Pedro Alvares Cabral
title_short: (7645-311) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 5 Rua Pedro Alvares Cabral
description: Local source of drinking water

title: (8670) Odeceixe - N120
description: Picnic spot next to the street. With 3 tables and benches. For about 3 motorhomes.

title: (7645-251) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 4 Rua Custódio Brás Pacheco
title_short: (7645-251) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 4 Rua Custódio Brás Pacheco
description: This general store with a self-service laundromat is located in the center of Vila Nova de Milfontes. A great shop with lots of shopping opportunities and very friendly service

title: (7645-251) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 28 Rua António Mantas
title_short: (7645-251) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 28 Rua António Mantas
description: Public toilet, open from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. Clean affair

title: (7645-217) Vila Nova de Milfontes - R. António Mantas
title_short: (7645-217) Vila Nova de Milfontes - R. António Mantas
description: Large parking area where to stop.

title: (8670) Odeceixe - N120
description: Area to spend the night. It is near a cemetery, but outside the area of fines after the new law of 2021 that prohibits overnight stays in the area of the Costa Vicentina Natural Park. Several parking spaces in front of the cemetery and a little further down on a dirt track there is a flat area with a space for a camper.

title: (7645-313) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 45 Rua do Moinho de Vento
title_short: (7645-313) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 45 Rua do Moinho de Vento
description: Point of sale (Drugstore) Sale of campingaz bottles (r901,904,907) and refill against old empty bottle

name: Monte Maravilhas
title: (7630) Monte Maravilhas
description: Simple beautiful campsite located in a valley. You come here for your rest. Lovely swimming pool filled with spring water. Nice loungers around it. Beautiful walking and cycling area. Nice village oo walking distance. Clean and simple sanitary facilities.

title: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes - Rua António Mantas
title_short: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes - Rua António Mantas
description: Parking tarpaulin, no service, 100 m from the one that is referenced, muddy in rainy weather

title: (8670-320) Odeceixe - 8670 Variante 19 de Abril
description: Nice location. You are not allowed to spend the night at the beach.

title: (7645-224) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 26 E Rua Artur Horta
title_short: (7645-224) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 26 E Rua Artur Horta
description: Another laundromat right near the Rio Laundromat. Machine prices a little cheaper. But no Miele machines.

title: (7645-296) Vila Nova de Milfontes -
description: Lavarie self service, with opening hours from 9h to 20h. We were there on a Sunday and it was closed.

title: (7645-282) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 48 Rua da Casa do Povo
title_short: (7645-282) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 48 Rua da Casa do Povo
description: Free parking for the day. Next to it there are very clean public toilets with showers that are freely accessible and free of charge.

title: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 29 Rua Das Pousadas
title_short: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 29 Rua Das Pousadas
description: Ample parking spaces next to the soccer field. Public fountain and toilet

title: (7630-174) Azenha do Mar -
description: You can go here with a motorhome and stay for the day…. The signs that prohibit the overnight were ereased with ink but for day time parking it’s a pretty nice place to stay.  Awesome for kayak or paddle board during the high tide. You can cross the river on foot to the other side where the beach and a very neat village is… we went there with a big RV and had no problems getting there. Very spacious.

title: (7645-253) Vila Nova de Milfontes - 6 N390
description: Gas station with some car washes. Our camper fitted underneath, 2.35 wide, 3.20 high and 9.30 long. I washed my solar panels with my own room

title: (8670-320) Odeceixe - 10 Rua Isaura de Oliveira Reis
title_short: (8670-320) Odeceixe - 10 Rua Isaura de Oliveira Reis
description: It is a street where you can park at night, it has a park for children and at the end of the street there are some trees. It is close to the bakeries for breakfast in the morning. It's not a big deal, but it's fine just to sleep, the street is quite straight.

name: Campiférias
title: (7645-243) Campiférias
description: Place on a street, which hardly disturbs. We wanted to stay 2 nights and ended up staying 11 nights. Everything fits here, the market hall opposite the entrance, a launderette, Spar and a Portuguese supermarket 200m away. Very nice place, great cheap restaurants, very nice people everywhere. The sea is within walking distance, we had the bikes with us. Great backcountry. Sanitary older but good and clean. A plus for us, there are no dogs on the site. Value for money is good here.

title: (8670-325) Odeceixe - Rua do Recanto
description: Public toilets and showers right by the beach

title: (7630-536) São Martinho das Amoreiras - Rua do Bairro Social/Rua Vale de Brique
title_short: (7630-536) São Martinho das Amoreiras - Rua do Bairro Social/Rua Vale de Brique
description: Parking lot with public toilets and water point.

address.street: Rua do Bairro Social/Rua Vale de Brique

title: (8670-320) Odeceixe - 195F Urbanização dos Malhadais
description: This parking lot is better suited than the one next to it. No one bothers you here. The bakery and the playground are still within easy reach. Don't use the other parking lot in front of the school! Suitable for max. 7m, as these are only normal parking spaces.

title: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes -
description: Lost in the middle of the woods, to avoid in heavy rain

name: Camping Milfontes
title: (7645-285) Camping Milfontes
description: Campsite with all services. Places pleasantly large and demarcated with bushes. dogs on a leash. Well equipped supermarket with moderate prices. Surrounded by terraced houses. Sanitary facilities are large and clean, but not the most modern. Not every faucet intact. Only two toilets are open off-season. Acti 16

title: (8670) Odeceixe -
description: Quiet little bistro for a beer in the evening and a coffee in the morning

title: (8670) Odeceixe - Unnamed Road
description: Flat earthen parking near the dune, hidden by trees.

title: (8670) Odeceixe - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful views with access to two beautiful beaches. We stopped here during the day. So far the most beautiful view in nature we had in Portugal in the last 2 days :)

title: (8670) Odeceixe - Unnamed Road
description: Very large space, no shade, trash cans on site. Ok for the day and not possible for the night. fine waking up at 6:00 a.m. in the morning. beautiful viewpoint and access to the beach (10min). Attention, there are two beaches. normal and nudist. but very good dealer.

title: (7630) Colos -
description: Nice place next to the road (not busy at all), nothing much around, but nature. good place to spend a night

title: (7630) Colos - 2 N389
description: In a small village, parking space in the center, but a container, drinking water tap, washing bike and toilet.

title: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes -
description: Small car park on a cliff of one or two places maximum with a magnificent view.

title: (8550) Selao - M501
description: On the parking lot of the chapel which is completely isolated from the village which is at a few hundred meters. Flat tarred ground. At the edge of the road but very little passage and very quiet. Very beautiful view of the valley, sunset on the mountains ... Sheltered from the wind, sun but a little shade on the sides of the chapel.

name: Monte Huam Hu
title: (7630-536) Monte Huam Hu
description:
Picture yourself waking up to the crisp morning air, surrounded by lush greenery that stretches as far as the eye can see. You step outside your camper van and take in the breathtaking view of the valley below - a sight so magnificent, it seems as though it's straight out of a postcard.

Welcome to Monte Huam Hu, a camping site that offers not just a place to park your camper van, but an experience that will leave you in awe. The site may be simple, but it has everything you need to make your stay comfortable. From water (limited) to electricity and access to WI-FI just a few steps away, you won't have to worry about anything else but immersing yourself in the beauty that surrounds you.

Take a stroll around the valley and explore the nearby hills. Find the perfect spot to lay in a hammock under the shade and take in the serenity that nature provides. With plenty of areas to hang out and relax, you'll never tire of the breathtaking views. There’s no air pollution at Monterey Huam Hu so the night sky is truly a breathtaking sight. 

Make Monte Huam Hu your home away from home and escape the hustle and bustle of daily life. This is where tranquility lives, and memories are made. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to discover one of nature's true wonders! 

The site does not offer a dump station. 

Please be kind to get in touch before visiting!

title: (7665) Craveiras -
description: Welcome to Pereiras-Gare! I offer a Park4night spot for one camper (less than 6 meters) with a beautiful view overlooking the landscape with Cork Oaks and Strawberry trees (Medronho). Enjoy the solitude surrounded by nature. Out of sight behind a crest you will find my garden and chickens and an old ruin that I am working on. Feel free to bring your dog, mine are very playful. I have a limited water supply for myself, but if you need 20l, just ask. You can also refill water in Santa Clara or Sao Marcos, only 15min drive from Pereiras. These little villages have nice restaurants too. In Pereiras, a 15 minutes walk away, you will encounter two small shops and two cafés. Please give me a call to find out the easiest access to the spot.

title: (8670) Odeceixe - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful cove just up the street. Has a trash can, shade in the morning, it's perfect for motorhomes and small motorhomes. The path here looks worse than it actually is.

title: (7555) Santiago do Cacém - Unnamed Road
description: Fresh water, tastes like Champagnem! Really good.

title: (7555) Setubal - Estrada de Colos
description: Free parking in front of sports area. Quiet at night. Close to city centre. BP gas station near by.

title: (7555) Chaparral - Unnamed Road
description:
Black and grey water dumping.
Fresh water refill point.
Right next to Junta de Freguesia do Cercal.
Cost free

title: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes -
description: Simpler parking if you have to stay overnight. no extras sandy

title: (8550) - N266
description: FONTE DA AMOREIRA Water source ... However, water is slightly yellowed by the old pipes.

title: (7630-521) Odemira - Ameixeira, EM 503
description: Very quiet, idyllic place with donkeys and chickens, surrounded by rolling hills and forests, in the heart of the Alentejo. Families with children are welcome. In the vicinity there are various possibilities for leisure activities such as hiking, swimming (lake within walking distance), bike tours, motocross and more. Shower, water toilet and WiFi are available. Prior registration by telephone required.

title: (8670) Odeceixe - Unnamed Road
description: Well-signposted cliffside car park. Very nice view of the ocean from the truck, small wooden esplanade built to take advantage of a beautiful space on the Atlantic coast

title: (7555) Vale de Água -
description: Regenerative farm in a beautiful piece of land. Close to Cercal and 15 minutes away from the coast line. With a new native forest growing with water, solar shower available and compost dry toilet. Very calm place perfect to reconnect with nature. Easy dust road access. The owners live next door and will be very happy to welcome you.

title: (8670) Odeceixe -
description: Small pitch for 1 or 2 vans, next to the lovely path along cliffs. Only for short cars (max. 6 meters).

title: (8670) Odeceixe - Unnamed Road
description: 4X4 ONLY because the area is over a sandy path, very quiet both day and night

title: (8670) Odeceixe -
description:
⚠️Please email beforehand if there is a seat available⚠️
 
We offer a pitch for up to three mobile homes.
 
On our pitch you can enjoy the tranquility in the middle of nature, experience the clear starry sky of Portugal and get to know other nature-loving campers on our pitch meadow.
 
Our pitch is near the village of Marmelete. Approximate distance 15 minutes driving time.

On site you can find:
Supermarket
Gas station
restaurants
cafes
 
The following places are away from us as follows:
Aljezur about 20 km
Monchique about 24 km
 
 
Please note:
The spot is still being improved, it is being worked on.
We have a limited water supply, but if you need up to 20 liters of water just ask. 5 minutes away from us is a public spring, where you can also get drinking water.
It's the same with electricity. There is no electricity on the pitch, but if you would like to charge your power bank, mobile phone or notebook, please just ask. Dogs are generally allowed, but they must be kept on a leash throughout the property and leashed on the pitch using a tow line in the immediate vicinity of the vehicle.
There is currently no toilet or shower. The WLAN reception is not available due to the location of the site.
 
We are pleased to meet you!
Fabian and Nina

title: (7670-201) Baixo Alentejo - M503
description: Quiet spacious parking lot at bridge. request not to put a toilet or leave rubbish. it's clean and nice here. and very quiet. there aren't many places around so let's be sparing with what's there.

name: Orbitur Camping Park - Sitava Milfontes
title: (7645) Orbitur Camping Park - Sitava Milfontes
description: Orbitur campsite

title: (7670-503) Santa Luzia - 3A Rua dos Marmeleiros
description: public toilet

title: (8670) Aljezur - Unnamed Road
description: Parking space in front of the beach, the beach is only stone. Not far away so few people. Little or no mobile connection

title: (8670) Odeceixe -
description: Via a dirt road through the dune area you arrive at a "levelled" plateau above a cliff. gives a nice view but can be very windy. on the plateau is a more sheltered place. From here there is a 10-minute walking route through the dune area to the beach. The access route is on a dirt road. take into account mul-sand. There are no climbing styles or deep descents. surrounded with trees.

title: (7670) Casas Velhas -
description: Quiet, natural pitch on dam. The right place to enjoy nature, listen to the birds and admire the spectacular starry sky.

title: (8670-440) Rogil - 81 Avenida 16 de Junho
description: Repsol gas station where you can fill the water tank (specifically announced on a sign). There is no emptying of gray or black water.

title: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes -
description:
Accessible 4x4, sand. Magnificent view, no wind tonight, sunset over the ocean, flat land. 1 location. Calme.
Bring your trash!

title: (8670) Pero Vicente - Unnamed Road
description: Small car park at the end of the gravel road. Access to the beach by wooden stairs. Waste container. We were alone. Not allowed to stay overnight!

title: (8550) - M501
description: Picnic area (4-5 tables) with a place to barbecue (provide a grill), next to a stream and an old mill. Quiet place, in the shade and cool. Location accessible by small van. Overnight prohibited.

name: Quinta do Rossi - Caravan Park
title: (7645-065) Quinta do Rossi - Caravan Park
description: Welcome to Quinta do Rossi ! We have a little caravan park where you can use our services such as: electricity, toilets w/ hot shower, water points, lounge areas & common area w/ washing machine, tables, sink, fridge, microwave & free wi-fi. You can also find some fresh bio products - wine, olive oil - and fresh seasonal vegetables for selling. Animals are allowed for a fee (on the leash). The beach is 2min away by car, 25min walking. For more info, check out our profile on Instagram or google, just search out “Quinta do Rossi” See you soon ! | WE DO NOT MAKE RESERVATIONS, BY ARRIVAL ORDER. PARK SCHEDULE: 9:00 AM to 21:00 PM.

name: Vidigal & Ocean
title: (8670-417) Vidigal & Ocean
description:
Your farm place in nature
4 exclusive pitches in Aljezur with private bathroom, hot shower, terrace and lots of space.
RESERVATION ONLINE ONLY ON THE HOMEPAGE (LINK UNDER CONTACT).
Feel good in the middle of nature and only 15 minutes to the beach.
In addition to wonderful, clean beaches, the area around Aljezur offers you unique hiking trails in the Vicentina National Park and a lively small town with numerous restaurants, cafés and markets.

title: (7670) Santa Pequena - Unnamed road
description: Quiet and clean corner in nature, in the middle of eucalyptus and oleander. Access by slightly bumpy track but passable by van.

name: Joios de Cima - Graceland
title: (8375) Joios de Cima - Graceland
description: Welcome to our beautiful farm in the Serra surrounded by pure nature. We have three dedicated spots for campers (less than 5 meters) with beautiful views overlooking our little wine and medronha terraces. We are an animal friendly family with dogs, cats and chickens. We welcome other family's and those looking for peace in this beautiful area. Please fill your water tanks in Sao Marcos at one of the two springs to be self sufficient here with your water use we ask an Arrival between 10.00 and 6.00pm and please email to check we have space. Head out of Sao Marcos and over the railway tracks then after a bit turn right under the railway bridge to Joios - stay on that road looking for signs 'Anika and Edd' We look forward to welcoming you :)

title: (8375) Silves -
description: Located at the base of a ruin similar to Weathertop Amon Sûl. On the last climb to the viewpoint, turn right. A relatively flat area for one or two 20ft vans with views across the Shire to Mordor. If you don't feel like visiting the Lord of the Nazgûl, Witch-King of Angmar, leave the place clean! The condition of the path corresponds to the horse trails of Rohan and should be manageable for vehicles of all kinds. There are no turning possibilities for teams longer than two horse lengths, or six meters.

title: (8550) - Unnamed Road
description: Under the trafficlights a good place near the woods in a small valley with many goats and silent houses where you can listen all the things around.

title: (7645) Vila Nova de Milfontes -
description: Long path possible to take by Van, car several possible places to sleep, quiet and clean place in the middle of the forest or possibility of going to the ocean

name: Green Oaks Alentejo
title: (7670-215) Green Oaks Alentejo
description:
We are a family of six and offer quietly located accommodation in a small river valley on our property.
Here you are surrounded by wild nature and have a phenomenal view of the night sky.
The pitches have direct access to the swimming area at the reservoir. A solar shower, a composting toilet and running water are freely available.
On the farm, which is about 500 m away, there are sheep, goats, chickens and a lovely friendly dog.
You can arrive with a mobile home, caravan or tent.
Our pitches are located about 10 minutes from Ourique and the IC1, or 15 minutes from the motorway.
Please let us know before you come, we will then meet on site.

title: (7555) Foros do Monte Novo - Rua de Acacio Guerreiro de Melo
title_short: (7555) Foros do Monte Novo - Rua de Acacio Guerreiro de Melo
description: Opposite the other well-known spots - on the other side of the lake there is a place for a camper that can be easily reached with a little skill. Mine is 6M Land, Sprinter 209 - backwards down the aisle I was able to position myself perfectly with a lake view. There are more standing options slightly above this square, but there is some junk here and there. So a good opportunity to leave a little order. It's so quiet here, so few cars pass on the embankment during the day. Otherwise you are alone, in the distance the campers on the other side.

address.street: Rua de Acacio Guerreiro de Melo

title: (8550) Monchique -
description: Wonderful spot, flat promontory with views overlooking Algarve foothills. Amazing sunset and sunrise. Worth driving extra 2 mins from Fôia.

title: (8550) Monchique - Unnamed Road
description: Water spout and washing trough. unsure if drinkable. only suitable to fill up bottles

title: (8550) Monchique - N266-3
description: Parking with great views and Great walks

title: (8550) Monchique - N266
description:
Quiet tarmac parking area by football pitch with shading from Cork trees. A much quieter and calmer alternative to the car park just up the road to spend the night.

Only sounds were dogs barking in the distance, otherwise really nice quiet spot.

title: (8670) Aljezur -
description: Flat sandy parking lot in rural techno zone. View on the country side. Surprisingly calm. Several camper cars.

title: (8550) Monchique - Estrada de Sabóia
description: Large parking. Very beautiful view. No services. restaurant nearby

title: (7555) Foros do Monte Novo - Unnamed Road
title_short: (7555) Foros do Monte Novo - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice place in height with plenty of space and view of the lake (easy to access, free and far from houses)

title: (8550-458) Monchique - 14 Rua Dom Francisco Gomes do Avelar
title_short: (8550-458) Monchique - 14 Rua Dom Francisco Gomes do Avelar
description: It's just a car park a little inclined . I didn't have any problems.. neither locals nor the police. it has a public toilet but it is only open when the market is up and running.

address.street: 14 Rua Dom Francisco Gomes do Avelar

title: (8550-471) Monchique - 40 Rua de São Sebastião
description: Laundry, with water tap and public WC.

title: (8550-462) Monchique - N266
description: Water point (potable?) available

title: (8550) Monchique - Caminho do Ambrósio
description: Marketplace below the helicopter landing pad with fresh water left to the tap. Only once a month or a week is here market. Lots of space super 4G reception. Slightly but very quiet.

title: (8550-455) Monchique - 7 Largo dos Chorões
description: Public toilets and right next to them a water tap. No parking as it’s the centre of the old town. Only possible to fill bottles.

title: (8550-458) Monchique - 8 Rua Dom Francisco Gomes do Avelar
title_short: (8550-458) Monchique - 8 Rua Dom Francisco Gomes do Avelar
description: Swimming pool and municipal shower. Access for €1 to both the pool and the shower, bathrooms and gym. To spend the day or just to clean yourself, it is a very good option! Everything clean and few people.

address.street: 8 Rua Dom Francisco Gomes do Avelar

title: (8670-440) Rogil - Unnamed Road
description: beach…

title: (8670) Rogil - Unnamed Road
description: Upper part of the parking lot where no prohibition signs have yet been put up.

title: (7555) Santiago do Cacém - Unnamed Road
description: Next to the dam, but flatter. Attention enter through the other end of the road in the right turn after the dam (on the side dam there is a big puddle where you could get bogged down). On weekends there must be people because there is a place to barbecue. When you arrive, turn in the grassy part to avoid going down because then very fine sand at the crossing.

name: Camperplaats Alferce
title: (8550) Camperplaats Alferce
description: Free service area.  Washing facilities, barbecue area with basin and running water. Please don't stand on the farmer's land. Respect the given places. There is a great bistro "Alfaris". Always great promotions, cakes, small dishes, live music.

title: (8550-145) Marmelete - 118 Rua de Aljezur
description: A very quiet place with good views. In the village there are public toilets with hot showers. There are also water sources.

title: (8550) Marmelete - N267
description: Water point at a gas station, water flows okay fast, (I don't know if you can drink it), there is also a toilet and a garbage can.

title: (7670) Funcheira - Rua do Poço Novo 11
description: Beautiful site in Alentejo with olive trees, hazelnuts, romancer, figes, cypres, loquats, a big ash tree, etc. close to the train station that connects Algarve to Porto. 40km to the beach (Vila Nova de Milfontes, Porto Covo, Praia do Malhão), 8km to a dam (Monte da Rocha). 3 min walk from public toilets and a restaurant. 15min walk to the nearest village (Garvão). Please contact before visiting. Always by e-mail or Whatsup.

title: (8550) Monchique - N266-3
description: Parking day and night free, on several levels. We had a quiet night, despite a Saturday night and the proximity of the street. Almost downtown, cafe, bar, restaurant nearby. Be careful the places in the shadows count on the fingers of the hand, and it heats! Small water point, but not possible to fill more than bottles.Toilettes (closed when we were there.). Laundry with faucet and WC 500 m north in the village. Heavy weight access ok. Intermarché seems brand new, but no service except lavomatic for the moment.

title: (8550) - N267
description: water spout. Not sure if drinkable :)

title: (7555) Foros do Monte Novo -
description: Magnificent view of the lake. Really quiet in November, some fishermen and hikers. If you enter directly after the dam you can walk along the water (maybe not if the water is higher) but there are some really big puddles on the forest road. We are not trying to enter from the north. enjoy it and keep it clean :)

title: (8550) Monchique - N266-3
description: Flat natural site next to the road a few hundred meters before the highest point (Fóia) in the Algarve. Beautiful view of Portimão and the sea.

title: (8550) Alferce - N267
description: Small picnic area with barbecue facilities on the side of the road. public toilets and water are available .

title: (8550-145) Marmelete - 1 Rua Inácio V. Cabrita
description: Public showers (even warm) and toilets. These are closed from Friday 5:00 p.m. to Sunday 9:00 a.m. Next to a cheap restaurant with wifi. Below is a fountain.

title: (8550) - N266-3
description: Fabulous place with a wonderful view towards Sagres and the Algarve as well as the West Coast. You can enjoy the sunset as well as the sunrise.

title: (8550) Monchique - N266-3
description: Small drinking water fountain and picnic tables :) not far from nice view!

title: (8550-328) Monchique -
description: Parking of the Intermarche. It is practical because it has a laundry service and at the petrol station you can load water. We slept quietly

title: (8550-145) Marmelete - 58 Rua Inácio V. Cabrita
description: Two strong, well-functioning taps without a customs connection. So canisters or handicraft connection Parking unfortunately only opposite, but you can stop there for a moment because there is almost no traffic.

title: (7670-613) Santana Da Serra - 6 Acesso a En 264
title_short: (7670-613) Santana Da Serra - 6 Acesso a En 264
description: Parking lot near IC1.

title: (7520) - Unnamed Road
description: Small alcove on the edge of the cliff for a single CC. The view is breathtaking. The police passed around 20:00 without saying anything.  Overnight prohibited.

title: (8550) Monchique - BP N266
description: Free water with hose available (I don't know if drinkable) / in the small REPSOL petrol station

title: (7555) Corgos -
description: On the banks of a dam that dried up at this time. On the edge of a eucalyptus forest. Total calm, only the noise bed insects. Easy access by following the track.

title: (7520-405) Sines -
description: Very nice view of pessegueiro island, and very quiet spot just to chill!

title: (7555) Corgos - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful spot, sheltered from the (s-w) wind. Reachable via gravel road from the dam, around the lake (anti clockwise). Tracks are 4x4 only, since there are some steep muddy climbs to tackle. Surrounded by only nature, didn’t see anyone. No network.

title: (7670) Garvão -
description:
Nestled in the heart of Portugal's beautiful countryside of Alentejo, our caravan host location offers a truly breathtaking experience. As the sun begins to set, the sky is transformed into a canvas of vibrant oranges, pinks, and purples and as night falls, you'll be treated to the magic of dark, starry skies that seem to stretch on forever.


At our caravan pitches the views from our site are truly panoramic, with vast horizons stretching out as far as the eye can see. The beautiful landscape is dotted with cork oaks, holms oaks, and other native trees, providing a tranquil and serene setting for your stay. That is why the distance between each pitch ensures that you have plenty of room to spread out and enjoy the beautiful views and nature that surrounds you
Nature lovers will be in their element here, as the area is alive with the sounds of birds and sheep grazing in the fields. The silence of nature is a constant companion, creating a sense of calm and relaxation that is hard to find in the hustle and bustle of city life.
Despite its isolated location, our site is conveniently located just a short distance from the local village, where you will find a range of amenities. If you're looking to explore further afield, the sea coast is just a 40-minute drive away, while the Algarve can be reached within an hour and Lisbon within two hours.
 Whether you need help, enjoy a delicious meal, or simply want to chat with friendly locals, our house is just a short walking distance away.
Please contact before visiting. Always by e-mail or Whatsup.

title: (8670) Aljezur -
description: Difficult area to find a spot. drove off road, experienced driver or 4x4 definitely would recommend. Parked just next to the road, really nice view. Can get a bit windy though (as you're on top of the mountain).

title: (7520) Setúbal - Unnamed Road
description: Place on the left side of the Pessegueiro Fort with fantastic views over the beach and Pessegueiro Island. Overnight prohibited

title: (7520-421) Sines - Ilha do Pessegueiro
description: It is a parking lot next to the beach. Highly recommended, the views are very beautiful. Next to it there is a beach bar.

title: () Sines - Unnamed Road
description: Showers and WC available near the beach and a parking, its free and you can take a good shower

title: (8550-145) Marmelete -
description: Stop with bins and benches with shade. well sheltered from wind. but very messy with rubbish

title: (7670) Santa Pequena -
description: A quiet dirt road close to the IC1. several flat spots available next to the road. a German lady stopped this morning to tell me there is a nicer spot about 500m further down the road across from her house.

name: Parque Campismo do Serrao
title: (8670-121) Parque Campismo do Serrao
description: Camping do Serrao. Open all year. Beautiful welcoming campsite in the middle of nature. Drainage and water services. Easy access.

title: (7670-201) Ourique - Unnamed Road
description: Free water tap including threading

title: (8550) Monchique -
description:
Welcome to the Wild Oasis. 
A beautiful space in nature with a rich weekly schedule of practices (meditation, yoga, breathwork, etc.). Come to relax, connect and enjoy. More details on wildoasisalgarve.com

We have different options for you to stay with your van. Minimum stay of 2 nights.

Attention: always book in advance.

Much love,
Wild Oasis Family

PS: Please be aware that the access is via a gravel road that is quite steep. Not recommended if you have a big motorhome. No problem for normal vans. No 4x4 needed.

title: (8670) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking to go to the beach, night prohibited

title: (7670) - Unnamed Road
description:
Calme, natural Place with animals. Dogs on the leash. Nice view in the Alentejo. 
Please contact us

title: (8670) Aljezur - N267
description: The road that passes by this place is very quiet! So a great place to spend the night as it is not possible anywhere on the coast.
